properties.areaDesc: Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus; Grand and Battlement Mesas; Flat Tops; Southwest San Juan Mountains; Northwestern San Juan Mountains
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 2 at 2:47AM MST until February 4 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Grand Junction CO
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12
inches with locally higher amounts possible. Winds gusting as
high as 50 mph.

* WHERE...Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus, Grand and Battlement
Mesas, Flat Tops, Northwest San Juan Mountains and Southwest
San Juan Mountains.

* WHEN...From 9 AM Monday to 6 PM MST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult at times with patchy
blowing snow significantly reducing visibility, especially in
open areas. Expect all mountain passes to be affected with
occasional whiteout conditions possible due to the combination
of gusty winds and snowfall. A detailed map of the snowfall can
be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM MONDAY TO 6 PM MST TUESDAY
